list.title: Albertours
list.description: Web application built with PHP for managing tour reservations across different cities in Spain. It allows users to explore available tours, make or cancel reservations, and view detailed information about each tour.

list.title: Roma8
list.description: Web and mobile application developed with Quasar for managing and administering a property. This project was done with a teammate.

list.title: Memory Game App
list.description: Java-based memory game application using MongoDB as the database. Users can register, log in, and play by selecting different difficulty levels. It stores times, results, and records, and is developed using the MVC design pattern.

list.title: Hotel Estrellas
list.description: Application for managing room reservations, offering a full client experience. Includes a mobile version with information on services like dining, pool, and gym. Allows users to search, explore, and book rooms quickly and securely. Team project.

list.title: Food App
list.description: Web application for managing food dishes, allowing data queries via a public REST API and storing relevant information in its own database. It also uses technologies for both dish searching and database management.

list.title: Templator
list.description: Integration of a WYSIWYG HTML editor called Summernote to create and manage HTML templates for sending emails.

list.title: Fitness Software
list.description: Application for developing a web platform to efficiently manage a fitness club and enhance the user experience.
